00033 Implemente_instanciable(Champ_Generique_Reduction_0D,"Reduction_0D",Champ_Gen_de_Champs_Gen);
00034 Add_synonym(Champ_Generique_Reduction_0D,"Champ_Post_Reduction_0D");
00035 // XD reduction_0d champ_post_de_champs_post reduction_0d -1 To calculate the min, max, sum, average, weighted sum, weighted average, weighted sum by porosity, weighted average by porosity, euclidian norm, normalized euclidian norm, L1 norm, L2 norm of a field.
00036 
00037 Sortie& Champ_Generique_Reduction_0D::printOn(Sortie& s ) const
00038 {
00039   return s << que_suis_je() << " " << le_nom();
00040 }
00041 
00042 // cf Champ_Gen_de_Champs_Gen::readOn
00043 Entree& Champ_Generique_Reduction_0D::readOn(Entree& s )
00044 {
00045   LIST(Motcle) mot_compris;
00046   mot_compris.add("min");
00047   mot_compris.add("max");
00048   mot_compris.add("euclidian_norm"); //!< new name for norme_L2
00049   mot_compris.add("normalized_euclidian_norm"); //!< new name for normalized_norm_L2
00050   mot_compris.add("moyenne");
00051   mot_compris.add("somme");
00052   mot_compris.add("moyenne_ponderee");
00053   mot_compris.add("somme_ponderee");
00054   mot_compris.add("moyenne_ponderee_porosite");
00055   mot_compris.add("somme_ponderee_porosite");
00056   mot_compris.add("valeur_a_gauche");
00057   mot_compris.add("L2_norm");  //!< L2 norm
00058   mot_compris.add("L1_norm");  //!< L1 norm
00059   mot_compris.add("average");  //!< new name for moyenne
00060   mot_compris.add("sum");  //!< new name for somme
00061   mot_compris.add("weighted_average"); //!< new name for moyenne_ponderee
00062   mot_compris.add("weighted_sum"); //!< new name weighted_sum for somme_ponderee
00063   mot_compris.add("weighted_average_porosity");  //!< new name for moyenne_ponderee_porosite
00064   mot_compris.add("weighted_sum_porosity");  //!< new name for somme_ponderee_porosite
00065   mot_compris.add("left_value");  //!< new name for valeur_a_gauche
00066 
00067   Champ_Gen_de_Champs_Gen::readOn(s);
00068   if (mot_compris.rang(methode_)<0)
00069     {
00070       Cerr << "Method " << methode_ << " is an unknown option for methode keyword in "<< que_suis_je() << "." << finl;
00071       Cerr << "Choose from " << mot_compris << finl;
00072       exit();
00073     }
00074   return s ;
00075 }
